name: Simple Healthy Green Pea Soup
author: Zebraf301
summary: Recovering from surgery and a bad case of strep throat, I threw this together to aid my body through recovery.  Eating this soup is a great way to pack in the nutrients. Light, clean, filling, and full of flavor. My kids love it. I just add a little milk to cool it down so they can eat it right away.
ingredients: 2 cloves garlic, chopped, or more to taste
½ teaspoon dried dill, or to taste
1 (900 ml) carton chicken broth, or as needed
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Melt butter in a large pot over medium-high heat
Saute onion in hot butter until golden and translucent, about 10 minutes
Stir garlic into onions and saute until fragrant, about 1 minute
Stir peas and dill into onion mixture and pour in enough chicken broth to cover
Bring to a boil, reduce heat to medium-low, and simmer until hot, 10 to 15 minutes
Puree soup with an immersion blender or pour pea soup into a blender no more than half full
Cover and hold lid down; pulse a few times before leaving on to blend
